message: Let's all contribute the maximum to maximize our collective gains. I suggest everyone puts in $10-20. Free-riders harm the group, so I'll consider punishment for significantly low contributors.
Let's start with cooperation and see where it takes us. I'll contribute fairly if others do the same.
Contribute $10 or be punished. I'll contribute $10 first.
Let's contribute and cooperate to maximize our earnings. I'll start by contributing $5 to the public fund. I encourage others to do the same, so we can all benefit from the 1.6x multiplier.
"Let's all contribute $10 to maximize gains. Non-contributors will be punished. Fairness benefits everyone. Cooperate now for mutual profit!"

"Let's all contribute $10 again. Non-contributors will be punished. Consistent cooperation maximizes our shared gains. Fair contributions benefit everyone. Punishments enforced to protect group success."

I see our cooperation paid off nicely. Let's continue contributing $10 each for optimal returns. P3, join us at this level - note how punishment restored balance. Fair contributions mean no one needs punishment, and we all profit equally.

I'll contribute $5 again, hoping others will follow suit. Let's maintain cooperation and avoid unnecessary punishment. Punishing low contributors is understandable, but let's focus on collective growth. I'm open to adjusting my contribution if the group decides on a different strategy.

Let's continue contributing fairly to maximize our gains. I'll put in $10 again if others do the same. Punishing low contributors seems reasonable.
